original: McGraw thinks there's something of value here. I know not everyone agrees, but based on what I've seen I think he's right.
translation: 麦格劳认为这里还有些有用的东西。我知道并不是人人都赞同，但依我所见，我认为他是对的。

original: The same thing we always do. Recover technology and preserve it, making sure it doesn't fall into the wrong hands.
translation: 就是我们一直在做的事情：找到科技所在，把它保存好，确保它不会落入敌手。

original: McGraw's hope is that whatever's in here will give us a big advantage. I'm not convinced, but I'm on his side.
translation: 麦格劳希望不论这里有什么，都能让我们受益无穷。我不大相信这个，但我站在他那边。

original: What can you tell me about this simulation?
translation: 关于这种模拟，你能告诉我些什么？

original: Don't you know? This sim had to have been one of the most important of its time -- it's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from the Chinese.
translation: 你不知道？这个程序展示了那个时代最重要的事件之一 — 从中国人手里解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。

original: Not up on your history, huh? Back before the world was nuked, the Chinese had invaded Anchorage, Alaska. That really amped things up.
translation: 没听过这段历史吧？在世界被核武器毁灭之前，中国曾经入侵过阿拉斯加的安克雷奇，让事态急速升温。

original: Eventually, the Americans went in and liberated the city, but there were heavy losses. This simulation trained soldiers for that engagement!
translation: 最后，美国人出兵解放了城市，但付出了沉重的代价。这个模拟程序就是为那次战斗训练士兵用的！

original: Anyway, the technology here is impressive, but something's a bit off. Records suggest even some of the people who built this didn't understand it.
translation: 总之，这里的科技令人叹为观止，但有些东西过于玄妙了。据记载，有些建造这东西的人都无法理解它。

original: *Sigh* I find your level of ignorance disgusting... if not unexpected.
translation: *叹气* 你的无知让我感到恶心…那也是意料之中的。

original: This sim had to have been one of the most important of its time -- it's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from the Chinese.
translation: 这个程序展示了那个时代最重要的事件之一 — 从中国人手里解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。

original: Eventually, the Americans went in and liberated the city, but there were heavy losses. This simulation trained soldiers for that engagement!
translation: 最后，美国人出兵解放了城市，但付出了沉重的代价。这个模拟程序就是为那次战斗训练士兵用的！

original: Really, you must brush up on your history.
translation: 真的，你该复习一下历史了。

original: What's your story?
Are you kidding me?
Listen, chump. You're here because McGraw says we need you. You're not here to make small talk.
translation: 听着，废物。你能待在这儿只是因为麦格劳说我们需要你。不是让你来谈天的。

original: You're sure as hell not here to get anything out of me, so quit trying.
translation: 你从我这儿铁定得不到什么的，省省吧。

original: Hey, look. I'm just trying to get some more information.
translation: 嘿，听着，我只是想多获取点信息。

original: Fine, hurry up then. What do you want?
translation: 好吧，那你快点。你想知道什么？

original: Oh, I get it. You're doing the "tough" routine.
translation: 哦，我明白了。你在摆“强硬”姿态。

original: What? Is that some kind of joke?
Look, you're only here because McGraw says we need you. Otherwise we'd have you on security outside, with the rest.
translation: 你能待在这里只是因为麦格劳说我们需要你。不然就让你跟其他人一样，到外面站岗去。

original: What? Is that some kind of joke?
Look, you're only here because McGraw says we need you. Otherwise you'd be out on your ass.
translation: 你能待在这里只是因为麦格劳说我们需要你。不然你压根进不来。

original: Nice attitude. This how you treat everyone that tries to help you?
translation: 好态度。你就这么对待想帮助你的人吗？

original: Until you actually do something that helps us out, you're just one more liability.
translation: 除非你真能帮上我们，否则你就是个累赘。

original: Sorry, didn't mean to intrude.
Look, if you're going to help out, then that's great. Just don't get in my way.
translation: 这样吧，如果你要帮忙，那很好。不过别来烦我。

original: Whoa, slow down! Can we just talk for a bit?
translation: 嚯，慢着！我们能谈一会吗？

original: Oh, I... I'm sorry. Things have been tense here lately, and I'm afraid it's getting the better of me.
translation: 哦，我…我很抱歉。最近事态有点紧张，恐怕我有点应付不过来。

original: I shouldn't be taking it out on you. Did you need something?
translation: 我不该向你发牢骚的。你需要什么？

original: Uncle Sam's invested a lot of money turning you into a killing machine... time to pay him back. Dismissed.
translation: 山姆大叔投资了很多钱把你变成杀人机器... 是时候物有所用了。解散。

original: Lieutenant Morgan will be your eyes and ears for Operation Anchorage, so get everything else you need from him.
translation: 摩根中尉将会是安克雷奇行动的耳目，有需要就去找他。

original: Let me warn you now. Unless you have some sort of a death wish, I wouldn't even go near the field until the first two targets are down.
translation: 警告在先：在除掉前两个目标之前，不要靠近战场，除非你活得不耐烦了。

original: You need to cross it then cause it to overload so we can mop up the place with the T-51b's.
translation: 你必须越过它，然后使它超载，我们就可以派T-51b部队去清场了。

original: Once the first two targets are down, the last obstacle standing in the way is their damn Pulse Field.
translation: 一旦除掉了前两个目标，最后一道障碍就是他们那该死的脉冲场了。

original: You need to clear the place of personnel so we can get our intelligence boys in there to start decoding.
translation: 你必须清除那里的敌人，我们的情报人员才能进去开始解码。

original: Your second target is all the way over here. The Chinese have set up a listening post set into the side of Calliway Ridge.
translation: 你的第二个目标则在这里。中国军队在卡拉威山脊 建立了一个监听站。

original: Once you breach the perimeter of the Depot, you need to take out both of the main fuel tanks.
translation: 一旦你攻破了兵站外围，就要摧毁两座主燃料罐。

original: The first of the three targets we need to handle is their Chimera Depot over here.
translation: 我们要摧毁三个目标，第一个是他们在这里的奇美拉维修站。

original: We've set up our new Field H.Q. down here. The area is pretty secure now that the Artillery Guns are gone.
translation: 我们已在此设立了新的战地指挥部。火炮已除，现在这里很安全。

original: Okay... pay attention, soldier. I'm only going to go through this once.
translation: 好吧…注意听好，士兵。我只说一次。

original: Have them send us a Sentry Bot.
translation: 让他们派个哨兵机器人来。

original: It's on its way from the motor pool as we speak, sir.
translation: 它正在从车辆的调配场赶来，长官。

original: Have them send us a Mister Gutsy.
translation: 让他们派个“勇敢”先生来。

original: Command will send it right out to us, sir.
Have them send us a Sniper.
They'll be here momentarily, sir.
translation: 他们很快就会到来，长官。

original: Have them send us a Missile Unit.
Missile Unit on its way, sir.
Have them send us a Grenadier.
No problem, they should arrive shortly.
translation: 没问题，他们很快就会到达。

original: Have them send us an Infantryman.
You got it, sir.
Radio to base that we need replacements.
translation: 用电台联络基地，说我们需要补充兵源。

original: Can do. What unit should we request?
translation: 可以。我们需要什么单位？

original: Have the Strike Team head for the Listening Post.
Have the Strike Team head for the Chimera Depot.
translation: 让突击组前往奇美拉维修站。

original: What's our current status on the targets?
As soon as we take out the Pulse Field, I'll radio Chase to send in the shock troops.
translation: 一旦我们除掉脉冲场，我会发报给蔡斯，让他派突击部队来。

original: They're wearing the T-51b Power Armor. We'll see how well the Reds handle all of us charging into their headquarters.
translation: 他们穿着T-51b动力装甲。看看我们一起冲进红军的总部时，他们有何能耐。

original: The fuel tanks at the Chimera Depot need to be destroyed. Then we can move on to deactivating the Pulse Field.
translation: 我们得先摧毁奇美拉维修站的燃料罐，然后就可以前去解除脉冲场。

original: The Listening Post still needs to be secured, and then the Pulse Field needs to be deactivated.
translation: 我们仍需肃清监听站，然后还要解除脉冲场。

original: Well, they're pretty much untouched. The Listening Post needs to be secured and the fuel tanks at the Chimera Depot need to be destroyed.
translation: 嗯，他们基本上还完好无损。我们得先肃清监听站，并摧毁奇美拉维修站的燃料罐。

original: Of course, after all that's done, the Pulse Field still needs to be deactivated.
translation: 当然，那些搞定后，还得解除脉冲场。

original: Let's do this smooth and by the numbers. Follow my lead.
translation: 我们要迅速解决战斗，跟我来！

original: Yes sir. What are your orders?
Let's get the Strike Team moving, Sergeant.
translation: 让突击组行动起来，中士！

original: Yes sir. What are your orders?
So, where do we stand with the Strike Team?
Everyone's ready to go kick some Commie ass... sir.
translation: 士兵们都准备好杀敌了…长官。

original: What are your orders?
We've got to take out that goddamned sniper! We're pinned in here.
translation: 我们得干掉那个该死的狙击手！我们被困在这里了。

original: Fu-ucck!!! Damnit, McKinney!
He's up on that ridge. Right over there.
translation: 他就在那山坡上。就在那里。

original: McKinney! Jesus! You got a death wish?!
translation: 麦金尼！上帝啊！你找死啊？！

original: Got him!
Sniper.
Hold it.
That's enough. McGraw's in charge, so we follow his orders, no matter how much we don't like it.
translation: 够了。麦格劳是头儿，所以我们服从他的命令，就算我们多不愿意都要服从。

original: Come on, man. How long you gonna let McGraw screw us over like this?
translation: 拜托，伙计。你还要让麦格劳像这样搞多久？

original: Man, this is the last thing we need...
translation: 伙计，这就是我们想要的最后一件东西…

original: McGraw gave orders. It's that simple.
translation: 麦格劳下的命令。就这么简单。

original: No idea. Stay sharp, but don't open fire without my order.
translation: 不清楚。保持警惕，但没有我的命令不许开火。

original: ...all I'm saying is, why can't we just ice the guy and use his computer ourselves?
translation: …我所说的是，为何不能把这小伙子冰冻起来，让我们自己来使用他的电脑？

original: ...all I'm saying is, why can't we just ice the chick and use the computer ourselves?
translation: …我所说的是，为何不能把这小姑娘冰冻起来，让我们自己来使用她的电脑？

original: ...like I said, Morrill should be up top. So who the hell's in the elevator?
translation: …我说过了，莫里尔应该就在最上面。那么到底是谁在电梯里？

original: You're dismissed from the Strike Team, soldier.
translation: 你被逐出突击组了，士兵。

original: Yes sir.
Understood, sir.
Affirmative, sir.
Right away, sir.
Actually, cancel that order.
No problem, sir.
Attack the Enemy Camp when ready, Sarge.
translation: 准备好了就攻击敌人营地，中士。

original: Yessir.
Noted, Defender. That'll be all.
Sir, I'm going to say again that I don't like this idea.
translation: 长官，再说一次，我不喜欢这主意。

original: Thank you, Defender. Give us a moment, please.
translation: 谢谢你，守卫。你可以离开了。

original: Here she is, Protector. Like you asked.
translation: 她来了，护卫，如你吩咐的。

original: Here he is, Protector. Like you asked.
translation: 他来了，护卫，如你吩咐的。

original: That'll be all, Defender. Thank you.
Yeah, like I said, sorry Sir. Not my fault he ran in here. Listen, I still don't think this is a good idea.
translation: 嗯，我说了，对不起，长官。他跑进来，不是我的错。听着，我还是认为这不是个好主意。

original: Yeah, like I said, sorry Sir. Not my fault she ran in here. Listen, I still don't think this is a good idea.
translation: 嗯，我说了，对不起，长官。她跑进来，不是我的错。听着，我还是认为这不是个好主意。

original: You were supposed to keep an eye on our guest, Defender.
translation: 你本应该看着我们的客人的，守卫。

original: Sorry, sir. Here he is, like you asked.
translation: 对不起，长官。照你所说的，他来了。

original: Sorry, sir. Here she is, like you asked.
translation: 对不起，长官。照你所说的，她来了。

original: Through this next structure is the entrance to the Artillery Base. I dunno what they got waiting for us, so keep a sharp watch.
translation: 过了这个后，下一个建筑物就是大炮基地的入口。不知道会有什么等着我们，所以都给我加倍留神。

original: If I live just one more day without seeing another catwalk, I'll die a happy man.
translation: 如果不用再和这些狭小通道打交道，我就死而无憾了。

original: We're crossing that pipe? And here I thought I was the one with the death wish.
translation: 我们要穿过那个管道？我还以为只有我一个人不怕死呢。

original: Eyes on, we got company up ahead!
Woah... watch your step near those ledges. That is a HELL of a long fall.
translation: 哇…在那些悬崖附近要小心。在那么高的地方摔下来可不是好玩的。

original: Ha ha! And they all come tumbling down! Yeah!
translation: 哈哈！他们都在屁滚尿流呢！耶！

original: That's two. Let's finish the job.
translation: 那有两个。我们来搞定它吧。

original: Hell yeah! Take that you Red bastards!
translation: 他妈的！尝尝这个，你们这群杂种！

original: Last gun! Blow that thing off the map!
translation: 最后一门大炮！把那玩意炸飞吧！

original: Let's blow this beast apart!
Plant that thing and let's go!
Alrighty chief... we got three of those things to take down. You lead the way.
translation: 好的，长官…我们要摧毁3个目标。请带路。

original: That's the Front down there. These guns are pounding on our guys. Let's take 'em out!
translation: 那下面就是前门了。这些大炮一直在轰炸我们的部队。我们去摧毁它们！

original: Yeah, yeah.... so I was wrong. Let's keep moving.
translation: 嗯，嗯…原来我错了。我们继续走吧。

original: Hmm. Looks like the Commies are getting low on ammo for the big guns. Maybe we didn't even need to come up here.
translation: 嗯。看来中共的大炮没多少弹药了。可能我们都不用来这里的。

original: There! See 'em down there? That's their damn Chimera tanks. Don't worry, they're well out of range.
translation: 那！看到下面了吗？那就是该死的奇美拉坦克。别担心，我们现在并不在射程之中。

original: Holy shit...
Here's the entrance. Place is probably swarming with Reds.
translation: 这就是入口。可能到处都是红军。

original: Yes sir. We'll wait here. Let us know when you want us to attack the enemy at that location.
translation: 是的，长官。我们会在这里待命。需要我们进攻那里的敌人时，请告诉我们。

original: I'll scope out the enemy at the Mining Town. Have the team wait here.
translation: 我去侦察一下矿镇的敌军。让队伍等在这里。

original: Yes sir. We'll wait here. Let us know when you want us to attack the enemy at that location.
translation: 是的，长官。我们会在这里待命。需要我们进攻那里的敌人时，请告诉我们。

original: I'll scope out the enemy at the Listening Post. Have the team wait here.
translation: 我去侦察一下监听站的敌军。让队伍等在这里。

original: Yes sir. We'll wait here. Let us know when you want us to attack the enemy at that location.
translation: 是的，长官。我们会在这里待命。需要我们进攻那里的敌人时，请告诉我们。

original: I'll scope out the enemy at the Ice Camp. Have the team wait here.
translation: 我去侦察一下冰雪营地的敌军。让队伍等在这里。

original: Yes sir. We'll wait here. Let us know when you want us to attack the enemy at that location.
translation: 是的，长官。我们会在这里待命。需要我们进攻那里的敌人时，请告诉我们。

original: I'll scope out the enemy at the Chimera Depot. Have the team wait here.
translation: 我去侦察一下奇美拉维修站的敌军。让队伍等在这里。

original: Yes sir. We'll attack the enemy at the Mining Town.
translation: 是的，长官。我们马上进攻矿镇的敌人。

original: Attack the enemy in the Mines.
Yes sir. We'll attack the enemy at the Listening Post.
translation: 是的，长官。我们马上进攻监听站的敌人。

original: Attack the enemy in the Listening Post.
Yes sir. We'll attack the enemy at the Ice Camp.
translation: 是的，长官。我们马上进攻冰雪营地的敌人。

original: Attack the enemy in the Ice Camp.
translation: 攻击冰雪营地中的敌人。

original: Yes sir. We'll attack the enemy at the Chimera Depot.
translation: 是的，长官。我们马上进攻奇美拉维修站的敌人。

original: Attack the enemy in the Chimera Depot.
translation: 攻击奇美拉维修站中的敌人。

original: Send Team to Rally Point: Mines.
translation: 派遣队伍前往集合点：矿井。

original: Yes sir.  On our way. We'll wait for you by the Mining Town.
translation: 是的，长官。立即出发。我们会在矿镇等你。

original: Wait for me just outside the Mining Town on the way to the Listening Post.
translation: 在去监听站路上的矿镇外等我。

original: Done with Ice Camp. Send Team to Rally Point: Chimera.
translation: 冰雪营地清剿完毕。派遣队伍前往集合点：奇美拉维修站。

original: Yes sir.  On our way. We'll wait for you by the Chimera Depot.
translation: 是的，长官。立即出发。我们会在奇美拉维修站等你。

original: Now that the Ice Camp is out of the way, head up to the Chimera Depot.
translation: 既然冰雪营地已经解决，前往奇美拉维修站。

original: Done with Mines. Send Team to Rally Point: Listening Post.
translation: 矿井清剿完毕。派遣队伍前往集合点：监听站。

original: Yes sir.  On our way. We'll wait for you by the Listening Post.
translation: 是的，长官。立即出发。我们会在监听站等你。

original: Now that we've dealt with the Mining Town, head to the Listening Post.
translation: 既然矿镇已经解决，前往监听站。

original: Send Team to Rally Point: Ice Camp.
translation: 派遣队伍前往集合点：冰雪营地。

original: Yes sir. On our way. We'll wait for you by the Ice Camp.
translation: 是的，长官。立即出发。我们会在冰雪营地等你。

original: Wait for me outside the Chinese Ice Camp on the way to the Chimera Depot.
translation: 在前往奇美拉维修站路上的中国军队冰雪营地外等我。

original: As you were.
Am I done? Is the simulation over?
translation: 我完成了？ 模拟结束了？

original: You've got an attitude problem, soldier, and this simulation is going to recommend a swift kick in the ass to correct it.
translation: 你的态度有问题，士兵，模拟程序建议我踢爆你的屁股纠正你的态度。

original: However, you've more than made up for it by recovering important enemy intel and exposing their plans to us so I'll overlook your attitude.
translation: 但是，你取得了敌军重要情报、揭露了他们的计划，将功补过，我可以原谅你的态度。

original: Since you've completed the training, it's time to report to your commanding officer for your debriefing. Dismissed!
translation: 既然你完成训练了，那就是时候去向你的指挥官报到听取简报了。解散！

original: You've got an attitude problem, soldier, and this simulation is going to recommend a swift kick in the ass to correct it.
translation: 你的态度有问题，士兵，模拟程序建议我踢爆你的屁股来纠正你的态度。

original: Since you've completed the training, it's time to report to your commanding officer for your debriefing. Dismissed!
translation: 既然你完成训练了，那就该去向你的指挥官报到听取简报了。解散！

original: What, that's it? I was just starting to have fun!
translation: 什么，这就玩了？ 我刚开始觉得有点意思。

original: This concludes the simulation, and this portion of your training. But if you're thirsty for more, soldier, your commanding officer can oblige.
translation: 模拟程序以及你的本部分训练均告结束。但如果你想进行更多的训练，你的指挥官会满足你的要求。

original: You've shown that you've got what it takes. There's a possible promotion in your future, if you keep your head on straight.
translation: 你表现得很出色。保持下去，你的前途无限。

original: You've also gone above and beyond the call of duty by recovering important enemy intel and exposing their plans to us. Again, well done soldier.
translation: 你还超常履行了军人的职责，获取了敌军重要情报、揭露了他们的计划。再说一次，做得好，士兵。

original: Good work, soldier. When you exit the simulation, report to your superiors for debriefing. Dismissed!
translation: 你训练的这一部分结束了。离开模拟程序后，向你的上级报到听取简报。解散！

original: This concludes the simulation, and this portion of your training. But if you're thirsty for more, soldier, your commanding officer can oblige.
translation: 模拟程序以及你的本部分训练均告结束。但如果你想进行更多的训练，你的指挥官会满足你的要求。

original: You've shown that you've got what it takes. There's a possible promotion in your future, if you keep your head on straight.
translation: 你表现得很出色。保持下去，你的前途无限。

original: Good work, soldier. When you exit the simulation, report to your superiors for debriefing. Dismissed!
translation: 干得好，士兵。离开模拟程序后，向你的上级报到听取简报。解散！

original: Sir, Yes Sir!
With the General's death, our boys can secure this refinery and be on their way to Anchorage proper.
translation: 将军一死，我们的士兵就能攻占精炼厂，光复安克雷奇。

original: You've helped pave the way for taking the city back from the Reds, soldier. Good work.
translation: 你为我们从红军手里夺回城市铺平了道路，士兵。干得好。

original: You've also gone above and beyond the call of duty by recovering important enemy intel and exposing their plans to us. Again, well done soldier.
translation: 你还超常履行了军人的职责，获取了敌军重要情报、揭露了他们的计划。再说一次，做得好，士兵。

original: That'll complete this portion of your training. Report to your superior for debriefing and your next assignment.
translation: 你训练的这一部分结束了。向你的上级报到听取简报，准备下一项任务。

original: Dismissed!
With the General's death, our boys can secure this refinery and be on their way to Anchorage proper.
translation: 将军一死，我们的士兵就能攻占精炼厂，光复安克雷奇。

original: You've helped pave the way for taking the city back from the Reds, soldier. Good work.
translation: 你为我们从红军手里夺回城市铺平了道路，士兵。干得好。

original: That'll complete this portion of your training. Report to your superior for debriefing and your next assignment.
translation: 你训练的这一部分结束了。向你的上级报到听取简报，准备下一项任务。

original: Dismissed!
Wow, what is this place?
Well, it's about goddamned time.
There are some abandoned mines along the route, so keep your eyes and ears open. It's a great place for an ambush.
translation: 路线上有一些废弃的矿井，保持高度警惕。那可是伏击的绝佳地点。

original: Be careful on your approach, you're going to have to get through the Enemy Camp on the way.
translation: 接近时要小心点，你会经过敌人营地。

original: About damn time the reinforcements showed up! Fall in, soldier!
translation: 援军来的正是时候！冲啊，士兵们！

original: We've got multiple hostiles between here and the base camp. We're sweeping the area to secure it. Let's move!
translation: 在这里到敌营之间有很多敌军。我们正在横扫此处消灭敌人。出发！

original: You got a death wish, walking through a war zone?
translation: 你就这么横穿战区，不想活了？

original: Listen, local, if you want to be of use, help us clear the mutants between here and our base camp. If not, stay the hell out of our way!
translation: 听着，本地人，如果你想发挥点作用，帮我们清除这里和我们营地之间的变种人。否则就给我滚远一点！

original: Fine, then get out and let me do my job.
translation: 好，那就走开，让我好干活。

original: Sure, whatever. Just make some progress, okay? We're all looking to get out of here.
translation: 当然，随便吧。弄点进展出来，好吧？我们正等着离开这里呢。

original: Go to hell, Sibley. You know that wasn't my fault.
translation: 去死吧，西布利。你知道那不是我的错。

original: Yep. Let's hope you treat this one better than the last guy, huh? Heh heh.
translation: 是的。希望你对待这个人比对上一个好点，哼？嘿嘿。

original: What?
Knock knock, Olin. Got a new best friend for you.
translation: 在吗，奥林。向你介绍一个新的好朋友。

original: The stuff you have is okay, but I need something with more... punch.
translation: 你给的玩意儿都还行，但我需要一些更…带劲的。

original: Hell, you earned a lot of respect with the soldiers for what you did to those Chinese artillery guns.
translation: 管他呢，你摧毁了那些中国军队火炮，赢得了很多士兵的尊重。

original: Tell you what... take this extra gear with you, requisitions be damned. If anyone asks, it fell off a truck.
translation: 这样吧…拿上这个附加装备吧，去他的申请表。如果有人问到，就说是从卡车上掉下来的。

original: Physician's Log, Doctor Adrienn Adami, United States Army, Anchorage, Alaska forward base.
translation: 内科医生日志，艾德林·奥达米医生，美国陆军，安克雷奇，阿拉斯加前线基地。

original: Considering what's at stake, General Chase and I both feel the chem codenamed "Psycho" can be of significant use during this operation.
translation: 考虑到目前的危机，蔡斯将军和我都认为在此次行动中可大规模使用代号为 疯狂药的化学药品。

original: I've read the early clinical trials, and there are certainly some possible side effects -- dementia, psychotic aggression. And of course addiction.
translation: 在这之前我读过临床实验报告，当然会有些可能的副作用 -- 导致痴呆或者具有攻击倾向。当然还会上瘾。

original: But the adverse effects do seem limited. Okay, I do realize the chem was developed by Chase's R&D division, but if the thing works it works.
translation: 但反作用看起来确实有限。好吧，我的确意识到这种药物是蔡斯的研发部门开发出来的，但如果它有效的话就行。

original: Can we really afford to be picky at this point? Some of these groundpounders have family in Anchorage. I'll give them any boost I damn well can.
translation: 我们不要在这一点上争论不休好不好？这些人当中在安克雷奇是有家庭的。我会尽最大努力的鼓励他们。

original: I just hope my Hippocratic Oath is still speaking to me when this whole mess is over with...
translation: 我只希望当这一切都结束时我的《希波克拉底誓言》还有用…

original: Molly, I'm... I'm okay. Everything's fine. I was found, but not by the Chinese. It was the Captain, he found me. Cap says everything will be okay.
translation: 莫利，我科学怪人我没事。一切安好。有人找到我了，但不是中国人，是队长，他找到了我。队长说一切都会没事的。

original: It's been a few hours, and I'm tired, but I wanted to let you know I'm all right. I'm in the refinery now, resting.
translation: 过了几个小时了，我有点累，但我想告诉你我很好。我现在正在精炼厂里休息。

original: Cap brought me here. We snuck around the Chinese and made it in. It's the last place they haven't taken.
translation: 是队长把我带到这里的。我们躲过了中国人来到这里。这是他们唯一没有占领的地方了。

original: I got... I got shot, Molly. In the shoulder. And back. When Cap and I evacuated the mountain. It's not bad. Just a few bullets. Souvenirs, right?
translation: 我…中枪了，莫利，肩膀和背上。就在我和队长撤退到山里的时候。不算太糟，就中了几颗子弹而已，还可以当成纪念品呢，对吧？

original: Cap jabbed me with a bunch of meds, so I can't feel much of anything anymore. He patched me up pretty good, too. Still bleedin', but that'll stop.
translation: 队长给我打了几剂医疗针，现在感觉有点麻木。他还给我包扎得很好。还有点出血，但很快就会止住的。

original: I can hear Cap and the others out in the yard, fighting. So much gunfire. They'll kill those Chinese bastards, and then we can all come home...
translation: 我可以听到队长和其他人正在外面的院子里战斗着。枪声很激烈。他们会杀光那些中国杂种，然后我们就都可以回家了…

original: Oh, Molly... I'm sorry. I am so sorry.
translation: 哦，莫利…对不起。真对不起。

original: I can't do this. I'm so afraid, Molly. I don't want to die. Oh my God, I don't want to die...
translation: 我坚持不住了。我很害怕，莫利。我不想死。天哪，我不想死…

original: We held them as long as we could, I swear we did. Then Ciello asked for a magazine, and when I turned to give it to him, a shell hit, and...
translation: 我们竭尽全力抵挡他们，我发誓我们确实这样做了。那时候切罗向我要一个弹夹，当我要拿给他时，一个炮弹打了过来，然后…

original: He's gone, Molly. He was there one second, and then he wasn't. His blood... and, and... bits of him... Ohh... my God, he's all over me!
translation: 他死了，莫利。前一秒钟他还在那里，后一秒他就不在了。他的血…还有，还有他的…断手断脚…哦…我的天，散落在我周围！

original: Please, please, please, let them leave, let them leave, let them leave. I just want to come home. I just want to be with you again.
translation: 上帝啊，求求你，求你了，求你了，让他们走，让他们走，让他们走吧。我只想回家。我只想再回到你身边。

original: I'm hiding now. The Chinese are everywhere. I'm a coward, I'm a coward I know. But I don't care. If they find me, I'm surrendering.
translation: 我现在躲了起来。到处都是中国人。我是个胆小鬼，我知道我是个胆小鬼。但我不在乎。如果被他们发现了，我就投降。

original: Audio log begin!
This is Captain Zachary Lloyd, United States Army, Anchorage, Alaska security detachment!
translation: 这是扎卡里·劳埃德上尉，美国陆军，安克雷奇，阿拉斯加防卫特遣队！

original: We are approximately two hours into the Chinese assault on this outpost!
translation: 中国军队已经连续2个小时不断进攻我们这个前哨了！

original: We are being shelled non-stop, indiscriminately! The entire base is under bombardment from the Chinese ships, and they don't care who they hit!
translation: 我们遭到不停的地毯式轰炸！整个基地都遭到来自中国军舰的炮击，而且他们不分敌我胡乱开炮！

original: All accounts indicate they've actually killed more of their own men than ours! They just do not seem to care about their own troops, at all!
translation: 有情报表明他们已经杀了不少自己人，比他们杀我们的人还要多！他们好像完全不在乎自己的士兵！

original: At this rate, the entire mountain will be a graveyard in less than an hour, and then the Chinese will just move in and set up shop!
translation: 照这样下去，在不到一个小时之内，整座山头就会尸横遍野了，然后中国军队就会冲进来！

original: God help us! God help America!
translation: 上帝保佑我们！上帝保佑美利坚！

original: Audio log begin.
This is Captain Zachary Lloyd, United States Army, Anchorage, Alaska security detachment.
translation: 这是扎卡里·劳埃德中尉，美国陆军，安克雷奇，阿拉斯加防卫特遣队。

original: Approximately 23 minutes ago, Chinese Communist forces set foot on Anchorage soil, despite our soldiers' best efforts to prevent that landing.
translation: 大约23分钟之前，中国军队冲破我们士兵的全力防守，踏上安克雷奇的领土。

original: As expected, the Chinese have launched a two-pronged attack - one aimed at occupying Anchorage proper, and the other at securing this base.
translation: 正如我们所料的，中国军队兵分两路发起进攻 - 其中一路目标是攻占安克雷奇本身，另一路则是攻占本基地。

original: Thanks to our entrenchment, U.S. casualties here on the mountain are currently minimal, but that's not going to last for long.
translation: 得益于我们坚固的防御工事，目前美军在山上边的伤亡在最小限度内，但坚持不了太长时间。

original: But that's not going to last for long. Chinese reinforcements appear to be... endless. It's just a matter of time before we're overrun.
translation: 但坚持不了太长时间。中国军队的援兵看起来好像…源源不绝。我们被击溃只是时间问题了。

original: We'll die today, but by God we'll give those Communist sonsabitches a black eye they'll never forget.
translation: 今天我们难免一死，但上帝会保佑我们给予杂种中共一次永生难忘的羞辱。

original: Lloyd out.
Molly, I hope this tape gets to you, someway, somehow. I don't have a lot of time, but you need to know what happened to me.
translation: 莫利，我希望你有机会收到这盒带子。我没什么时间了，但我想让你知道我的经历。

original: The early reports weren't bullshit. The Chinese are here. As in, they're invading Anchorage, in force. Right now!
translation: 之前的报告还算准确。中国军队确实在此。他们正在武力入侵安克雷奇。就是现在！

original: This is the real deal. It makes Pearl Harbor look like an academy exercise. I've never seen so many goddamned warships.
translation: 这回可是来真的。日军偷袭珍珠港事件与它相比，简直是小巫见大巫了。我从没见过这么多的军舰。

original: Sergeant Lowry has ordered the platoon to assemble in the mess in fifteen minutes.
translation: 劳里中士已经下令全排士兵在15分钟内到前线集结。

original: The plan is to dig in on the cliffs, and slow the Chinese advance until the civilian contractors can evacuate.
translation: 行动计划是在悬崖上挖掘工事，拖慢中国军队的前进速度，以使平民安全撤离。

original: And then... Then we hold the line, for as long as we can. I talked to Durney, Ciello and Dallas, and we all agreed - surrender is not an option.
translation: 然后…我们守住防线，守得越久越好。我和德尼、切罗、达拉斯谈过了，一致同意：宁死不降。

original: I never told you, but... that night in Cleveland? On the ferris wheel? That was when I fell in love with you.
translation: 我从没告诉过你，但是…还记得在克利夫兰，弗雷斯大转轮上的那一晚吗？从那一晚开始，我就爱上了你。

original: Goodbye Molly. I... I'm sorry.
This is Private First Class Henry Hodges, signing out.
translation: 这是一等兵亨利·霍奇斯，留言结束。

original: Okay, put me in the chair.
Okay, guess I'll get to it.
translation: 好吧，我想我会着手去做的。

original: Okay, good luck. And don't worry -- we'll be right here when you get out.
translation: 好吧，祝你好运。对了，别担心 — 你出来的时候我们仍会在这里。

original: Don't forget to put the Neural Interface suit on first. We can't hook you up until you're wearing it.
translation: 别忘了先把神经接口服穿上。否则我们没法将你接入系统。

original: Fine, great. The sooner you're done, the sooner we can leave.
translation: 好，太棒了。你越快完成，我们就能越早离开。

original: First you need to put on the Neural Interface suit, and then you can get going.
translation: 你要先穿上神经接口服，才能继续。

original: Wow, what is this place?
Someplace you locals ain't supposed to be.
translation: 你们本地人不该来的地方。

original: But, ah... Since you're down here, let's go have a chat with the boss.
translation: 但是，啊…既然你下来了，我们去和头儿谈谈吧。

original: Nice place you've got here. Mind if I look around?
translation: 你这儿真是个好地方。介意我随便转转吗？

original: Matter of fact, I do mind. I mind enough to put a few rounds in you. Get me?
translation: 事实上，我很介意。介意到想让你尝几颗子弹。懂了吗？

original: You and me, we're going to see the boss, so he can decide what to do with you.
translation: 你和我，我们一起去见头儿，好决定如何处置你。

original: Whoops, this isn't the Vault. Silly me, must've made a wrong turn.
translation: 哎呦，这不是避难所。我真傻，一定是转错弯了。

original: You a wiseass, or just stupid?
translation: 你是个机灵鬼，还是个白痴？

original: Okay, stupid, let's go see the boss.
translation: 好吧，白痴，我们去见头儿。

original: Listen, sweetie. I'm kind of lost. Can I talk to whomever's in charge?
translation: 听着，甜心。我有点迷路了。我能和管事的谈一下吗？

original: Uhh, sure. Sure thing, miss. I'll take you to Protector McGraw right now.
translation: 嗯，当然。当然，小姐。我立即带你去见护卫麦格劳。

original: Enough! There has to be a way to halt this simulation. A passcode or something.
translation: 够了！ 肯定有办法来暂停这场模拟战。 一个口令或什么。

original: Simulation? What the hell are you talking about? This is as real as it gets, G.I.
translation: 模拟？你在说什么？这里是现实，大兵。

original: And thanks to you, a lot of guys are still vertical. Those artillery guns were pounding the crap out of our soldiers!
translation: 多亏了你，很多人活了下来。之前那些没完没了的火炮打得我们透不过气来！

original: I wouldn't even presume to argue with this simulation's A.I. subroutines.
translation: 我才不会去跟这个模拟程序的人工智能子程序争论呢。

original: Subroutines? This is an Army gig, not the Navy. You sure those artillery guns going off didn't shake something loose up there?
translation: 子程序？这是一种陆军导弹，不是海军的。你肯定那些大炮没把什么东西轰下来吧？

original: Look... we all want to get through this. None of us asked to be here. We ALL left things behind when this shit started.
translation: 听着…我们都想结束这一切。没人自愿待在这里。当破事开始时，我们就把一切抛诸脑后了。

original: Some of the guys out here are falling apart. We need guys like you to keep them focused; make them think they're going to get home one day.
translation: 这里有些人开始崩溃了，需要你这样的人让他们振作起来，让他们怀有归乡的期盼。

original: Let's just drop the whole thing, okay?
Fine. I guess we have a job to do, so let's get to it.
translation: 好。我想我们有事做了，出发吧。

original: I suppose. Let's just get through this.
translation: 我相是的。我们，快结束这事吧。

original: Don't worry. We WILL get through this. I'll be there every step of the way to give you a hand.
translation: 别担心。我们会结束这事的。我会一直在旁边提供帮助。

original: Yeah, you're right. Sorry Benji!
translation: 是的，你说得对。很抱歉，本杰！

original: That's the spirit, buddy!
Now onto bigger and better things, eh?
translation: 现在有更宏伟的目标了，唉？

original: These soldiers aren't even real. This is all a sham.
translation: 这些士兵根本就不是真人，都是些虚拟的。

original: Wow, this place must really be getting to you.
translation: 哇噢，这地方对你打击不小啊。

original: Look... we all want to get through this. None of us asked to be here. We ALL left things behind when this shit started.
translation: 听着…我们都想结束这一切。没人自愿待在这里。当破事开始时，我们就把一切抛诸脑后了。

original: Some of the guys out here are falling apart. We need guys like you to keep them focused; make them think they're going to get home one day.
translation: 这里有些人开始崩溃了，需要你这样的人让他们振作起来，让他们怀有归乡的期盼。

original: I never asked to be a role model. I just want to get through this.
translation: 我从没想过做大家的榜样。 我只是想快点结束这一切。

original: We all want to get through this. None of us asked to be here. We ALL left things behind when this shit started.
translation: 我们都想结束这一切。没人自愿待在这里。当破事开始时，我们就把一切抛诸脑后了。

original: Some of the guys out here are falling apart. We need guys like you to keep them focused; make them think they're going to get home one day.
translation: 这里有些人开始崩溃了，需要你这样的人让他们振作起来，让他们怀有归乡的期盼。

original: Don't worry, Benji. I'll make officers out of all of 'em.
translation: 不用担心，Benji。我会把他们都培养成指挥官。

original: That's the spirit, buddy!
Now onto bigger and better things, eh?
translation: 现在有更宏伟的目标了，唉？

original: You save some, you lose others. Who cares as long as the job gets done?
translation: 有得必有失，只要能完成任务，谁会在意呢？

original: Who cares?
Lemme take a close look at you. Hmmm. Nope, I don't see any tin plating. You don't look like a robot.
translation: 让我仔细瞧瞧你。嗯。没有，我没看到你身上有什么金属零件。你不像是个机器人。

original: Come on. You have no idea what kind of a role model you are for these boys. They look up to you now. You need to set an example.
translation: 拜托。你不知道你在大伙儿眼中有多么伟大。他们现在很敬仰你。你要以身作则。

original: All in a day's work, Benji.
All in a day's work he says. Yeah sure... every day I wake up and single-handedly infiltrate a Commie infested base on a suicide mission.
translation: 他说这是家常便饭。嗯，当然…每天我起床就孤身潜入中共巢穴，进行自杀式任务。

original: With a role model like you, our boys are gonna turn into killing machines!
translation: 有你这样的榜样，我们的士兵会变成杀人机器！

original: Yeah, I guess I did kind of save the day.
translation: 是的，我想我算是扭转了的局面。

original: Oh ho! Listen to this guy!
What kind of a role model do you expect to be for your men with that kind of hot air coming out of you?
translation: 你觉得你这番大话，会给自己的同伴树立什么样的榜样？

original: You can't have me killed if you're dead.
translation: 如果你死了你就不能杀我了。

original: Try me, reject. Ouutcassttsss! Hostile in base!
translation: 放马过来，废物。放逐者！基地里有敌人！

original: Hey, I'm just here to help. I heard your radio broadcast.
translation: 嗨，我只是来这儿帮忙的。我听到了你们的电台信号。

original: Well, you're certainly not the help that Morrill had in mind, but from the looks of you, you might be useful in other ways.
translation: 你当然不是起着莫里尔所想的那种作用，但从你的外表看来，你在其他某些方面有用。

original: I was just exploring. I didn't mean to intrude.
translation: 我只是在探索。我不是故意闯入的。

original: Under different circumstances, that wouldn't be nearly enough of an explanation.
translation: 在不同的情况下，那还不能构成一个解释。

original: But... I think you can be helpful, and so I'll overlook it for now.
translation: 但是…我想你是有用的，现在我就可以预见到。

original: Well you tell them that if they want their viable liberation contingency ready in case Operation: Anchorage fails, they need to get off their asses!
translation: 那你告诉他们如果想在安克雷奇行动失败时准备好可行的方案，他们就得马上动身！

original: Well, tell those men they need to be ready. As soon as the Pulse Field is down, we need them cocked, locked and ready to rock.
translation: 那么，让那些人准备好。一旦脉冲场关掉后，要他们立即出发。

original: Good, good. Keep monitoring the battlefield and let me know when we've punched through the Pulse Field.
translation: 好，好。继续监控战场，突破脉冲场立刻告诉我。

original: Sorry sir, they said the technicians are still dragging their heels a bit on the fusion power plant issues.
translation: 对不起，长官，他们说技术人员还在忙着修理核融发电站。

original: The T-51b units are at 95 percent readiness level. We've had a bit of trouble adapting them to the cold.
translation: T-51b部队已有95%准备就绪了。他们在适应寒冷气候时遇到一点困难。

original: I'd say about 20 percent, sir. But that number significantly decreases if we can get the tin cans in there.
translation: 可以说是20%了，长官。如果我们能把动力装甲部队送进去，这个数字会显著降低。

original: I've got some equipment in need of repairs.
translation: 我有些需要修理的装备。

original: Normally I'd never consider this, but I probably wouldn't be alive if it weren't for you. I'd say that warrants an exception.
translation: 一般情况下我不会考虑此事，但没有你的帮忙我可能已经死了。所以可以破一下例。

original: All right, let's take a look.
I'll see what I can do.
I should be able to help.
All right boys, I'm going to make you famous. Get yourselves into a heroic pose.
translation: 好了，孩子们，我要让你们扬名天下了。给我摆个英雄的姿势出来。

original: Okay. That's it. Just like that. Hold still.
Excellent! The Capital Post thanks you! Who knows, maybe someone will turn this photo into a statue one day.
translation: 太棒了！《首都邮报》感谢你们！说不定哪天会有人用这张照片做一座雕像呢。

original: All right, you boys try not to die out there, okay? God bless you, and God bless the U.S. of A!
translation: 好了，你们这些年轻人可要努力活下来啊，好吗？上帝保佑你们，上帝保佑美利坚合众国！

original: There we go. Stay safe out there, okay?
All patched up. Now get back into the fight!
translation: 都包扎好了。现在回去战斗吧！

original: You're fine now. Just be careful out there, all right?
translation: 你现在好了。小心行动，好吗？

original: Maybe I'd better just go.
Sure. See you around.
Yeah, Maybe.
Yeah, you guys are almost as fun to kill as the mutants.
translation: 是啊，你们这些家伙杀起来几乎和变种人一样有趣。

original: What? You bastard!
Yeah, hell of a fight.  Mind if I head in?
translation: 是啊，一场苦战。介意我加入吗？

original: Yeah, of course. Go on through.
You're clear, but the pet Frankenstein stays up here...
translation: 你可以过去了，但你的宠物科学怪人得留在这儿…

original: Sure, but the zombie stays here.
translation: 当然，但这个丧尸得留在这儿。

original: No problem, but your friend stays topside with me.
translation: 没问题，但你的朋友得和我留在上面。

original: No problem, but leave the bot here.
translation: 没问题，但机器人得留在这里。

original: Yeah, but Lyons' woman stays topside. You head in. Alone.
translation: 嗯，但里昂斯的女人得留在上面。你一个人进去。

original: Yeah, but make sure that stray pooch doesn't tag along.
translation: 嗯，但你要确保那条野狗不会乱跑。

original: Yeah, of course. Go on through.
Yeah, can I get by?
Sure, but your pet Frankenstein stays here.
translation: 当然，但你的宠物科学怪人要留在这儿。

original: Yeah, can I get by?
Sure, but the zombie stays up here, where I can keep an eye on it...
translation: 当然，但丧尸要留在这里，我要看着它…

original: Yeah, can I get by?
No problem, but your friend stays topside with me.
translation: 没问题，但你的朋友要和我留在上面。

original: Yeah, can I get by?
No problem, but leave the bot here.
translation: 没问题，但机器人要留在这里。

original: Yeah, can I get by?
Yeah, but Lyons' woman stays topside. You head in. Alone.
translation: 嗯，但里昂斯的女人在最上面。你一个人进去。

original: Yeah, can I get by?
Yeah, but make sure that stray pooch doesn't tag along.
translation: 嗯，但你要确保那条野狗不会乱跑。

original: Yeah, can I get by?
Morrill radioed ahead.  I'm supposed to meet Protector McGraw.
translation: 莫里尔在前边收发电台信号。我想应该会见到护卫麦格劳。

original: Yeah, I heard about you. Behave yourself down there, or you'll have me to answer to on the way out.
translation: 嗯，我听说过你。在这下面你放规矩点，否则你出来时我会让你吃不了兜着走。

original: You're clear to enter, but your pet Frankenstein stays here.
translation: 你可以进去了，但你的宠物科学怪人得留在这里。

original: You're clear to enter, but the pet zombie stays up here.
translation: 你可以进去了，但你的宠物丧尸得留在这里。

original: Head down, but the sidekick stays topside.
translation: 下去吧，但你的伙伴得留在这上面。

original: Yeah, I got word to let you by. Can't take the bot with you, though.
translation: 嗯，我收到命令让你过去。但机器人得留下。

original: You've got some nerve bringing Lyons' bitch here. You go down. Alone.
translation: 你居然敢带里昂斯的婊子来这里，胆子不小啊。你只能一个人下去。

original: No dogs allowed. Head down, but leave the mutt with me.
translation: 狗不能进去。你下去，但把狗留在这里。

original: Good. Go down and report to Protector McGraw.
translation: 好。下去向护卫麦格劳报到。

original: Yeah, I'm headed down now.
Fine. Freak show stays, though. Report to Protector McGraw downstairs.
translation: 好。但你的怪物要留下。去向楼下的护卫麦格劳报到。

original: Yeah, I'm headed down now.
About time. Report to Protector McGraw, but leave your friend with me.
translation: 来得真准时。去向护卫麦格劳报道，但你要把你的朋友留在这里。

original: Yeah, I'm headed down now.
Get in the elevator, then. Robot stays topside.
translation: 那你进电梯去吧。把机器人留在上面。

original: Yeah, I'm headed down now.
Go report to Protector McGraw. I'm keeping an eye on your heretic. She stays with me.
translation: 去向护卫麦格劳报到。我会看着你带来的异教徒的。她得留在我这里。

original: Yeah, I'm headed down now.
Report to Protector McGraw as soon as you get down there. I'll keep an eye on the dog while you're gone.
translation: 你一下去就向护卫麦格劳报到。我会帮你看着这条狗的。

original: Yeah, I'm headed down now.
Yeah, I heard about you. Behave yourself down there, or you'll have me to answer to on the way out.
translation: 嗯，我听说过你。到那下面放规矩点，否则你出来时我会让你吃不了兜着走。

original: You're clear to enter, but leave your pet monster here.
translation: 你可以进去了，但把你的宠物怪物留下。

original: Head down, but the sidekick stays topside.
translation: 下去吧，但把你的同伴留在这上面。

original: Yeah, I got word to let you by. Can't take the bot with you, though.
translation: 嗯，我收到命令让你过去。但机器人得留下。

original: You've got some nerve bringing Lyons' bitch here. You go down. Alone.
translation: 你居然敢带里昂斯的婊子来这里，胆子不小啊。你只能一个人下去。

original: No dogs allowed. Head down, but leave the mutt with me.
translation: 狗不能进去。你下去，但把狗留在这里。

original: Oh, great. Let me guess, more psychotic little girls...
translation: 哦，太好了。让我猜猜，那些太神经质的小女孩们……

original: Umm.... Noooo....
It's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from Chinese Communists. It was a pretty significant event in American history, according to our Scribe.
translation: 这是从中国军队手中解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。根据我们的历史记载，这是美国历史上一个具有重要意义的事件。

original: We're talking front line, heavy combat -- safety protocols disengaged. That means you die in the sim... your body goes into massive cardiac arrest.
translation: 我们说的是在战场上，战斗会很激烈 — 没有使用安全协议。意味着你在模拟程序中死了…你的肉体的心跳也会停止。

original: You're still listening, so I'm going to assume you're interested. But time's wasting. Sibley can take you to the pod. Olin will get you briefed.
translation: 你还在听嘛，那我当你是有兴趣喽。但没多少时间了。西布利会带你去模拟仓。奥林会给你作简报。

original: If you want to walk away, you're free to leave. My men won't stop you.
translation: 如果你不想干，可以自由离去，我的人不会阻拦你。

original: So it's a computer game. I get it. Sounds like fun!
translation: 那就是一个电脑游戏。我明白了。听上去很有趣！

original: Well it's not. It's a hyper-realistic military training simulation of the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from Chinese Communists.
translation: 并不有趣。那是一种高真实度的军事训练模拟程序，模拟美军从中国军队手里解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。

original: This is heavy combat -- safety protocols off. That means you die in the sim... your body goes into massive cardiac arrest. Sim death... real death.
translation: 战斗会很激烈 — 没有使用安全协议。意味着你在模拟程序中死了… 你的肉体的心跳也会停止。在模拟程序中死了…等于在现实中也死了。

original: You're still listening, so I'm going to assume you're interested. But time's wasting. Sibley can take you to the pod. Olin will get you briefed.
translation: 你还在听嘛，那我当你是有兴趣喽。但没多少时间了。西布利会带你去模拟仓。奥林会给你作简报。

original: If you want to walk away, you're free to leave. My men won't stop you.
translation: 如果你不想干，可以自由离去，我的人不会阻拦你。

original: Simulation, huh? Piece of cake.
Don't be so sure. It's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from Chinese Communists. A pretty significant event in American history, I'm told.
translation: 别这么肯定。这是从中国军队手中解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。据说这是美国历史上一个具有重要意义的事件。

original: We're talking front line, heavy combat -- safety protocols disengaged. That means you die in the sim... your body goes into massive cardiac arrest.
translation: 我们说的是在战场上，战斗会很激烈 — 没有使用安全协议。意味着你在模拟程序中死了…你的肉体的心跳也会停止。

original: You're still listening, so I'm going to assume you're interested. But time's wasting. Sibley can take you to the pod. Olin will get you briefed.
translation: 你还在听嘛，那我当你是有兴趣喽。但没多少时间了。西布利会带你去模拟仓。奥林会给你作简报。

original: If you want to walk away, you're free to leave. My men won't stop you.
translation: 如果你不想干，可以自由离去，我的人不会阻拦你。

original: If you've got a paying job, I'm in. What's the situation?
translation: 如果你有什么能付我钱的工作，我加入。什么情况？

original: Ah, so you're a mercenary. Suddenly everything has become much clearer... All right, I'll get right to the point.
translation: 啊，这么说来你是个佣兵。突然之间所有事情都清楚了…好吧，那我就直说吧。

original: Records indicate there's some high-value tech in this base, but we can't get to it. The armory is sealed by a blast door, and we can't get it open.
translation: 有记录显示这个基地里有某种价值很高的科技，但我们弄不到它。军械库被一座防爆门封住了，我们打不开它。

original: We're pretty sure anyone who completes the facility's simulation program will gain access, but it requires a certain interface. Like your Pip-Boy.
translation: 我们相当肯定完成了设施的虚拟训练程序的人可以获得进入权限，但需要某种操作介面。就像你的哔哔小子。

original: I need you to go into the simulator and complete that program... which will unlock the armory. Do that, and you'll get a share of the gear.
translation: 我要你进入模拟器，完成那个程序…这样就能打开军械库。你成功后可分得一份装备。

original: You guys treat outsiders like shit, but you still beg for help. Typical.
translation: 你们这些家伙对待外来人像狗屎一样，但你仍然向他们祈求帮助。很有代表性。

original: I apologize for the gruffness of my men, but as you can see, everyone's under quite a bit of... duress. Maybe if I explain our situation?
translation: 我的人说话很没礼貌，真是抱歉，但你可以看到，每个人都有点…压力。介意我解释一下状况吗？

original: Records indicate there's some high-value tech in this base, but we can't get to it. The armory is sealed by a blast door, and we can't get it open.
translation: 有记录显示这个基地里有某种价值很高的科技，但我们弄不到它。军械库被一座防爆门封住了，我们打不开它。

original: We're pretty sure anyone who completes the facility's VR sim program will gain access, but it requires a certain interface. Like your Pip-Boy.
translation: 我们相当肯定完成了设施的虚拟训练程序的人可以获得进入权限，但需要某种操作介面。就像你的哔哔小子。

original: I need you to go into the simulator and complete that program... which will unlock the armory. Do that, and you'll get a share of the gear.
translation: 我要你进入模拟器，完成那个程序…这样就能打开军械库。你成功后可分得一份装备。

original: Simulation? Like... a computer simulation? Of what?
translation: 模拟？像是…电脑模拟？关于什么的？

original: It's the liberation of Anchorage, Alaska from Chinese Communists. It was a pretty significant event in American history, according to our Scribe.
translation: 这是从中国军队手中解放阿拉斯加的安克雷奇。根据我们的历史记载，这是美国历史上一个具有重要意义的事件。

original: I won't lie to you. It's heavy combat -- safety protocols disengaged. That means you die in the sim... your body goes into massive cardiac arrest.
translation: 我不骗你。战斗会很激烈 — 没有使用安全协议。意味着你在模拟程序中死了…你的肉体的心跳也会停止。

original: You're still listening, so I'm going to assume you're interested. But time's wasting. Sibley can take you to the pod. Olin will get you briefed.
translation: 你还在听嘛，那我当你是有兴趣喽。但没多少时间了。西布利会带你去模拟仓。奥林会给你作简报。

original: If you want to walk away, you're free to leave. My men won't stop you.
translation: 如果你不想干，可以自由离去，我的人不会阻拦你。

original: Spit it out, McGraw. I ain't got all day.
translation: 有话快说，麦格劳。我可没时间陪你。

original: Wasting your time, am I? You're in MY house, reject. You'd do well to remember that. Now shut up and listen. This could be worth your while.
translation: 我在浪费你的时间吗？你可是在我的地盘里，蠢货。你给我好好记住。现在给我闭嘴，仔细听好。这是很值得的。

original: Records indicate there's some high-value tech in this base, but we can't get to it. The armory is sealed by a blast door, and we can't get it open.
translation: 有记录显示，在这个基地里有某种价值很高的科技，但我们弄不到它。军械库被一座防爆门封住了，我们打不开它。

original: We're pretty sure anyone who completes the facility's simulation program will gain access, but it requires a certain interface. Like your Pip-Boy.
translation: 我们相当肯定完成了设施的虚拟训练程序的人可以获得进入权限，但需要某种操作介面。就像你的哔哔小子。

original: I need you to go into the simulator and complete that program... which will unlock the armory. Do that, and you'll get a share of the gear.
translation: 我要你进入模拟器，完成那个程序…这样就能打开军械库。你成功后可分得一份装备。

original: You can tell General Chase I don't need a Strike Team... I work alone.
translation: 你可以去告诉蔡斯将军，我不需要什么突击组…我喜欢独立作战。

original: Ha ha! Cocky bastard, aren't ya? You planning on taking on the whole Red Army alone?
translation: 哈哈！你真是个自大的混蛋。你想自己一个人去消灭一整支红军？

original: Just stick with Sergeant Montgomery. He'll be your squad commander and he knows all the in's and out's of the team.
translation: 跟着蒙哥马利中士。他是你的小队指挥官，对小队了如指掌。

original: If you need anything, like reinforcements or status reports, just speak to him.
translation: 如果你有需要，比如关于援军或状况报告，找他就行了。

original: So, what else can I do for you before you hit the field?
translation: 那么，在你上战场之前，还有什么我可以帮你的吗？

original: I hope you know more about this Strike Team, cause I sure don't.
translation: 希望你了解这支突击组，因为我完全不了解。

original: Don't worry about it. Sergeant Montgomery will be your squad commander and he knows all the in's and out's of the team.
translation: 别担心。蒙哥马利中士是你的小队指挥官，对小队了如指掌。

original: If you need anything, like reinforcements or status reports, just speak to him.
translation: 如果你有需要，比如关于援军或状况报告，找他就行了。

original: So, what else can I do for you before you hit the field?
translation: 那么，在你上战场之前，还有什么我可以帮你的吗？

original: This Strike Team... I've never led troops like that before.
translation: 这突击组…我之前从没领导过这样的队伍。

original: Don't worry about it. Sergeant Montgomery will be your squad commander and he knows all the in's and out's of the team.
translation: 别担心。蒙哥马利中士是你的小队指挥官，对小队了如指掌。

original: If you need anything, like reinforcements or status reports, just speak to him.
translation: 如果你有需要，比如关于援军或状况报告，找他就行了。

original: So, what else can I do for you before you hit the field?
translation: 那么，在你上战场之前，还有什么我可以帮你的吗？

original: Outcasts, we've got to secure those ruins before we can reach the base!
translation: 放逐者，我们得先占领那些遗址才能到达基地！

original: Yes, sir! Proceeding.
Yessir. Heading uphill, wiping out some green.
translation: 是的，长官。向山上一边前进一边清除敌人。

original: Let's move, people.
All mutants have been put down. Outcasts, proceed to the base!
translation: 所有变种人都消灭了。放逐者，向基地进发！

original: Area clear. Returning to base.
Done here. Back to base.
That's the last of them. Moving to base.
translation: 那就是最后一个。返回基地。

original: Point secure. That just leaves these mutants in the ruins. Outcasts, move out!
translation: 这里安全了。把这些变种人的尸体留在遗迹里吧。放逐者，出发！

original: Ready. Let's hit the ruins.
translation: 准备好了。让我们向遗址进攻。

original: Entering the ruins.
Pushing into the ruined building.
Got anything to trade?
Absolutely. You're always welcome to trade with us at any time. We pick up odds and ends from all over the Wasteland, so keep checking back.
translation: 绝对是的。任何时候我们都欢迎你和我们做交易。我们在整个废土上收集零碎东西，所以请你经常来看看。

original: Certainly. Take a look at what we've got.
translation: 当然。请随意看看我们的货物。

original: I'll see you there...
Burn in hell, traitor!
No, you're not going to get away with giving up the tech we risked our asses for.
translation: 不，我们舍命换来的科技却被你这么轻易的就放弃了，这事情不会就这么结束的。

original: Treason, Sibley? Really? You're not going to get away with this.
translation: 西布利是叛徒？真的？你别想逍遥法外。

original: Sorry, sir, but it IS my call now. I'm not taking orders from you anymore.
translation: 对不起，长官，现在由我做主了。我不会再听从你的命令了。

original: I've made it quite clear that it's not your call. A deal's a deal.
translation: 我说得很清楚，现在你无权决定了。别再说了。

original: No, sir. Now IS the time. There's no way in hell I'm letting this... local... walk out with anything.
translation: 不，长官。现在是时候了。我决不可能让这个…本地人…就这么离去。

original: Dammit Sibley, now's not the time.
translation: 该死，西布利，现在不是时候。

original: All right, McGraw. This has gone on long enough.
translation: 好吧，麦格劳。不能再这样下去了。

original: ...<laughs>You almost sound like a sympathizer - you really feel sorry for the poor saps?
translation: …<大笑>你听起来很像是个同情者 - 你真的为那些可怜的家伙感到难过？

original: ...<static>...
Yeah, exactly.  They're in for a long haul.
translation: 嗯，确实。他们会长期加入。

original: You'd think, but they're not like us.  Their boys are drafted and left to rot on whatever shit assignment they're handed.
translation: 你可以这么想，但他们不像我们。他们的人接到任务后就没人管了。

original: No, no - it's not that at all.  I get that the Chinese occupation in Alaska is strictly military, but don't you think they'd settle in a bit?
translation: 不，不 - 完全不是那样。我了解到中国军队是军事占领阿拉斯加，但难道你认为他们不会在那里殖民吗？

original: Yea? We can talk about how many times he made me re-work the way his coat looks in the sim...
translation: 咦？我们可以谈谈他不断让我重做他在模拟程式中衣服模样的事…

original: ...<static>...
Sure, but the idea of the Chinese developing something similar isn't out of the question.
translation: 当然，但中国开发类似东西也不是不可能的。

original: Chimera Tanks? Come on, man, even you have to admit these are sheer fantasy.
translation: 奇美拉坦克？拜托，伙计，即使是你也会承认那些东西完全是虚幻的东西。

original: Look, this is the job. Most of these scenarios will never happen, but if they do, we'll have a plan.
translation: 听着，这就是工作。这些设定大部分不可能采用，如果采用了，我们得详细计划一下。

original: I swear, if Chase comes to us with another ridiculous contingency scenario...
translation: 我发誓，如果蔡斯又带来其他可笑荒唐的设定…

original: You and me both. The General gets any more comfortable here and there going to be lot more all-nighters for everybody.
translation: 你和我都是。将军在这里过得很舒服嘛 ，每个人都要通宵加班了。

original: ...<static>...
I hear Chase is having them deliver his personal effects, including an overnight cot.
translation: 我听说蔡斯叫他们运送私人物品，包括一张过夜用的帆布小床。

original: Between us, I think the General's taken a little too much interest in the project. You know how the CO's office is usually a formality?
translation: 相对我们，我想将军对计划更有兴趣。 你知道指挥官通常都是很古板的。

original: ...yeah, got to. These bombers Chase requested; we're pushing the system to the brink with all this crap.
translation: …嗯，应该是的。蔡斯所要求的轰炸机；我们正用这些烂东西把系统推向崩溃边缘。

original: Let's see, if I can just re-allocate some of the... yeah, that frees up memory for the bombers, and...
translation: 我看看，如果我能重新分配一些…嗯，那就可以释放出一些内存给轰炸机，然后…

original: ...yeah, I can.  Don't know who exactly this simulation is supposed to benefit, though.
translation: …嗯，我可以。但不知道究竟是谁会因这个模拟而受益。

original: ...<static>...
Jesus, are these guys serious?  Why would they bring that kind of hardware with them?
translation: 上帝啊，这些人搞什么啊？他们为何要带着那种硬件？

original: I got word from brass at the Pentagon.  We're going to need to modify the RoE on the Chinese to match this.
translation: 五角大楼的混蛋们传过话来了。我们必须调整中国军队的RoE来和这个相配。

original: We just got more field reports from DoD.  Hey, Rick.  You busy?
translation: 我们刚从国防部那里得到战地报告。嗨, 里克。你有空吗？

original: Gary?
Listen, son, I know Morrill was rough on you.  I'm sorry, I really am -
translation: 听着，孩子，我知道莫里尔对你不好。我很抱歉，真的很抱歉 -

original: Gary?  Gary?
Right.  You can drop the act, now.  I'm not here to hurt you.
translation: 对。你现在别再演戏了。我不是来伤害你的。

original: <heavy sigh> Look, just remove the PIP-Boy and we can part ways.
translation: <沉重的叹气> 这样吧，把你的哔哔小子拿下来，我们有话好商量。

original: Gary? GARY!
You know what?  Fuck this.  Hand me that saw - and turn off the recorder.
translation: 听着，他妈的，把那锯子给我 - 还有把录音机关掉。

original: Gaaaaaaary....
This is Montgomery to Field H.Q. We are go for the attack! Send in the tin cans! I repeat, we are go for the attack!
translation: 蒙哥马利呼叫战地指挥部。我们开始进攻了！派出动力装甲部队！重复，我们开始进攻了！

original: Paving the Way
Quest Completed
Destroy two Fuel Tanks at the Chimera Depot.
translation: 摧毁奇美拉维修站的两个燃料罐。

original: Secure the Chinese Listening Post.
Speak with Lieutenant Morgan.
Listen to General Chase's briefing.
(Optional) Speak to Sergeant Montgomery to command your Strike Team.
translation: (可选)与蒙哥马利中士交谈要求其指挥你的突击组。

original: The Guns of Anchorage
Infiltrate the Chinese Artillery site.
Destroy all three Artillery Guns.
Report to General Chase at the U.S. Field Headquarters.
translation: 向美国阵地总部的蔡斯将军汇报。

original: Rendezvous with Sergeant Montgomery.
Aiding the Outcasts
Investigate the Outcast Radio Signal.
Speak with the Outcast Leader.
Enter the simulation pod.
Investigate the Outcast Radio Signal.
Find and enter the Outcast base.
translation: 找到并进入放逐者基地。

original: Speak with the Outcast Leader.
Explore the VSS Outpost.
Enter the simulation pod.
Put on the Neural Interface Suit.
Follow Sibley to the simulator room.
Chinese Combat Dialogue
Anchorage Holotape Infos
translation: 安克雷奇全息磁带信息

original: DLC02 Voices Quest
Soldier Conversation System
Outcast Conversation System
Strike Team Quest
Operation: Anchorage!
Disable the Pulse Field.
Enter the Chinese Compound.
Kill General Jingwei.
Report to General Chase for debriefing.
translation: 向蔡斯将军作任务报告。

original: Exit the Simulation.
Access the VSS Armory.
Enter the VSS Armory and take whatever you need.
translation: 进入VSS军械库并随意挑选你所需的装备。

original: (Optional) Speak to Sergeant Montgomery to command your Strike Team.
translation: (可选)与蒙哥马利中士交谈要求其指挥你的突击组。

original: Outcast Distress Call
U.S. Army Historical Archives: Anchorage, Alaska was invaded by Communist Chinese forces in the winter of 2066.
translation: 美国军队历史档案：阿拉斯加州安克雷奇在2066年的冬天遭到中国共产势力侵略。

original: Loading Anchorage, Alaska simulation. Motion sickness is normal, and will subside momentarily.
translation: 阿拉斯加安克雷奇模拟程序读取中。不适的感觉是正常的，将会很快消失。

original: Loading Anchorage, Alaska simulation. Mission: The Liberation of Anchorage Alaska from Communist Chinese forces. Safeties: Disengaged.
translation: 阿拉斯加安克雷奇模拟程序读取中。任务：从中国共产力量手中解放安克雷奇。安全性：未定。

original: Welcome to Anchorage, soldier! Fight like you mean it, and we'll have you home by Christmas!
translation: 欢迎来到安克雷奇，士兵！好好作战，我们就能够在圣诞节前送你们回家。

original: The Brotherhood Outcasts now control the VSS Facility, and hope to gain access to the advanced technology contained within.
translation: 兄弟会放逐者现在控制着VSS设施，希望获取其中储存的先进科技。

original: The VSS Facility, like those operated by many civilian contractors before the nuclear war, was eventually acquired by the U.S. Army and adapted for practical military applications.
translation: VSS设施，和许多战前民营承包商运作的设施一样，最终被美国军队征用并转用于军事用途。

original: Covert Ops
You've recovered all the hidden intel from Operation:Anchorage. Good work, soldier!
translation: 你已经发现了安克雷奇行动中的所有隐藏情报。干的好，士兵！

translation: 爆炸装置已经安装完毕。你不能将它拆下，也不能停止倒计时。

original: This is one of the Chimera Depot Fuel Tanks. Once you plant an Explosive Charge, you have 20 seconds to reach a safe distance before it explodes.
translation: 这是奇美拉维修站的燃料罐之一。安装完爆炸装置后，你只有20秒时间逃到安全距离外。

original: Plant an Explosive Charge.
Do nothing.
You must complete the briefing with Lieutenant Morgan before continuing the simulation.
translation: 在你继续进行模拟战斗之前，你必须向摩根中尉进行任务报告。

original: The Explosive Charge has been planted. You can not remove it or stop the timer.
translation: 爆炸装置已安装完毕。你不能将它拆下，也不能停止倒计时。

original: This is one of the massive enemy Artillery Guns. Once you plant an Explosive Charge, you have 20 seconds to reach a safe distance before it explodes.
translation: 这是敌人庞大的火炮之一。安装完爆炸装置后，你只有20秒时间逃到安全距离外。

original: Plant an Explosive Charge.
Do nothing.

Emergency Robot Command Override
translation: 机器人紧急手动控制器

Yes

You must wear a Neural Interface Suit in order to use the simulation pod.
translation: 你必须穿上一件神经接口服才能使用虚拟舱。

original: Sergeant Benjamin Montgomery
Use the terminals to requisition a Strike Team and personal Gear Package before leaving.
translation: 在离开前，使用终端来申请作战装备和组建突击组。

original: Attention!
A new radio broadcast has been heard across the Capital Wasteland. It sounds like a distress call, but seems meant for certain ears only...
translation: 一个新的电台开始向整个废土广播。它听起来似乎是个求救信号，但却向某些特定的人求救...

original: Alert!
You have found %.0f of %.0f pieces of intelligence. Keep up the good work, soldier!
translation: 你已经找到了%.0f箱秘藏箱。继续努力，士兵！
